hero.motto: Your new favorite spot to dine

about.title: About Us – Due Fratelli
about.p1: A lovingly set table, good conversations with friends or family, the aroma of freshly baked pizza and homemade pasta – these are the moments that make life special. At Due Fratelli, we bring exactly this feeling to you: with authentic Italian cuisine, warmth, and a place where you feel welcome.
about.h2: Dining in the Ambiance of the Counts of Luckner
about.p2: Founded by two brothers, our restaurant combines culinary expertise with familial hospitality. Here, people come first – whether you're stopping by spontaneously, celebrating a special occasion, or simply enjoying a relaxed evening.
about.p3: Due Fratelli is integrated directly into the ensemble of Kim Schlosshotel im Park and offers seating for around 130 guests. A unique ambiance that combines history, style, and comfort.
about.p4: Whether traditional stone-oven pizza, handmade pasta, fine antipasti, or a sweet tiramisu to finish – we cook with passion. We use selected ingredients, great attention to detail, and place high value on quality, taste, and authenticity. Just like you would expect from Italy.
about.h4: Your Visit to Due Fratelli – Comfortable & Delightful
about.p5: We want you to feel completely at home with us. Enjoy Italian cuisine, friendly service, and an ambiance that invites you to linger. Benvenuti – we look forward to your visit!

menu.title: Menu
menu.subtitle: All of Italy on one plate - in the restaurant or to take away!
